Posts.Content: it sounds to me they checked your psa too soon after radiation. i had surgery, then radiation when my psa started to rise again, checked my psa 2 months after radiation and it was undetectable, and has stayed there for the last year, good luck.
Posts.Signature: diagnosed oct. 08, psa 16.5 gleason 4 + 3, rp jan. 09 cancer in seminal vesicles, removed 18 lymph nodes all clear, psa 0 till sept. 10, srt 30 treatments, psa still 0 as of august 11.
Posts.Title: PSA following prostrate surgery and radiation therapy
